      • getAudioInputStream

        public static javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream getAudioInputStream(java.io.File file)
                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets an audio input stream given a file, hopefully containing audio data.
        Parameters:
        file - The File to test.
        Returns:
        An AudioInputStream, or null on failure.
        Throws:
        Assorted - exceptions if the file does not contain valid audio.
        java.lang.Exception
